BRAN: Jon said he was a deserter BRAN: Our way is the old way? BRAN: Is it true he saw the White Walkers? BRAN: So he was lying? BRAN: Where will they go? Their mother’s dead BRAN: NO! BRAN: Please father! BRAN: What about you? BRAN: I saw the king! He’s got hundreds of people! BRAN: But he’s coming right now! Down our road!
